title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About Lunchbox's Balloon (Week of 2/22)
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About Lunchbox's Balloon (Week of 2/22)
description:
This edition of the podcast features behind the scenes from show members and moments that happened after we turned off the microphones. Morgan2 brings in Eddie to talk about the jingle he shared this week that he wrote for Hersey's. She also brings in Lunchbox to talk about his 'Wish Balloon'.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
